mapper.select:
/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 (고객번호별) */ SELECT X.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T2.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T2.COPN_DV_CD /*법인격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'COPN_DV_CD', T2.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대폰번호1*/ , T2.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대폰번호2*/ , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대폰번호3*/ , X.DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , X.DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금담당자번호*/ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL /*T:집금파트너상세*/ WHERE PRTNR_NO = T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND OG_TP_CD = 'HR1' -- TODO: 수정 예정 AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PRTNR_KNM /*집금담당자명*/ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(T5.FWBOO_DTM,1,8),'YYYYMMDD')+4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /*등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일*/ , (SELECT NOTY_RCV_YN FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(OC_BSDT,1,6) = X.OC_BSYM) AS NOTY_RCV_YN /*알림수신여부*/ FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) AS OC_BSYM , A.CST_NO , A.NOTY_TRS_DT , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_AMT,0)) AS DLQ_AMT , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_BLAM,0)) AS DLQ_BLAM FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ A /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B /*T:고객기본*/ ON B.CST_NO = A.CST_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /*렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동*/ AND NVL(A.DLQ_BLAM,0) > 0 /*연체잔액*/ AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' /*발생기준일자*/
AND A.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = A.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = '01' /*연락제외대상유형코드-01:고객번호*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD IN ('02','03') /*연락제외매체유형코드-02:문자,03:알림톡*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT) /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/ GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) , A.CST_NO , A.NOTY_TRS_DT ) X INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 /*T:고객기본*/ ON T2.CST_NO = X.CST_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS WHERE BND_BIZ_DV_CD IN ('L20','L21') /*채권업무구분코드- L20:렌탈 L21:리스 */ ) T3 /*T:채권계약기본*/ ON T3.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T4 /*T:계약결제기본*/ ON T4.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T4.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ WHERE FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /*채권알림톡업무코드-B:예고관련*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ ) T5 /*T:채권메시지중계내역*/ ON T5.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(T5.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) = X.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATA_MMT_TRAN WHERE TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /*템플릿코드*/ ) T6 /*T:알림톡전송*/ ON T6.RESERVED3 = T5.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND T6.RESERVED1 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND T6.RESERVED2 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ AND T6.RESERVED5 = T5.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ WHERE 1 = 1

/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 (계약별) */ SELECT X.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T2.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T3.CNTR_NO||'-'||T3.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_SN /*계약상세번호*/ , T2.COPN_DV_CD /*법인격구분코드*/ , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND CD_ID = 'SELL_TP_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T5.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_NM /*상품구분*/ , T7.PD_CLSF_NM /*상품명*/ , (SELECT SL_RCOG_DT FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ /*T:WELLS매출월마감내역*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')) AS SL_RCOG_DT /*매출일자*/ , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대폰번호1*/ , T2.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대폰번호2*/ , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대폰번호3*/ , T4.MPY_BSDT /*자동이체 약정일자*/ , (SELECT (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND CD_ID = 'FNT_DV_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = S1.FNT_DV_CD) FROM TB_RVCL_BIL_PLAN_BAS S1 /*T:청구계획기본*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND BIL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND ROWNUM = 1) AS FNT_DV_NM /*결제수단*/ , X.DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , X.DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금담당자번호*/ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL /*T:집금파트너상세*/ WHERE PRTNR_NO = T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND OG_TP_CD = 'HR1' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PRTNR_KNM /*집금담당자명*/ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(T8.FWBOO_DTM,1,8),'YYYYMMDD')+4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /*등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일*/ FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ X /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 /*T:고객기본*/ ON T2.CST_NO = X.CST_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS WHERE BND_BIZ_DV_CD IN ('L20','L21') /*채권업무구분코드- L20:렌탈 L21:리스 */ )T3 /*T:채권계약기본*/ ON T3.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T3.CNTR_NO = X.CNTR_NO AND T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T4 /*T:계약결제기본*/ ON T4.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T4.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T5 /*T:계약상세*/ ON T5.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 /*T:상품기본*/ ON T6.PD_CD = T5.BASE_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS T7 /*T:상품분류기본*/ ON T7.PD_CLSF_ID = T6.PD_CLSF_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ WHERE FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /*채권알림톡업무코드-B:예고관련*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ ) T8 /*T:채권메시지중계내역*/ ON T8.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(T5.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) = X.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATA_MMT_TRAN WHERE TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /*템플릿코드*/ ) T9 /*T:알림톡전송*/ ON T9.RESERVED3 = T8.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND T9.RESERVED1 = T8.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND T9.RESERVED2 = T8.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ AND T9.RESERVED5 = T8.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND X.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /*렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동*/ AND LPAD(X.DLQ_BLAM,0) > 0 /*연체잔액*/ AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X.OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' /*발생기준일자*/
AND X.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = '01' /*연락제외대상유형코드-01:고객번호*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD IN ('02','03') /*연락제외매체유형코드-02:문자,03:알림톡*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT) /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/
mapper.update: /* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 - 저장(알림톡 대상 선정) */ UPDATE TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ SET NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 AND CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' AND NVL(NOTY_RCV_YN,'N') = 'N'
mapper.insert: /* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 - 저장(이력) */ INSERT INTO TB_CBBO_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_HIST ( /*T:렌탈CB연체이력*/ CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , HIST_CH_DTM /*이력변경일시*/ , CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD /*렌탈CB등록구분코드*/ , DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , FST_OC_DT /*최초발생일자*/ , OC_BSDT /*발생기준일자*/ , OC_CRT_DT /*발생생성일자*/ , OC_FILE_CRT_DT /*발생파일생성일자*/ , CHG_FILE_CRT_DT /*변동파일생성일자*/ , RLS_FILE_CRT_DT /*해제파일생성일자*/ , BF_RLS_DT /*이전해제일자*/ , RLS_DT /*해제일자*/ , DL_DT /*삭제일자*/ , CLCTAM_OG_TP_CD /*집금조직유형코드*/ , CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금파트너번호*/ , NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , NOTY_FW_OJ_YN /*알림발송대상여부*/ , NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_DT /*알림수신일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_YN /*알림수신여부*/ , NOTAK_RS_CD /*알림톡결과코드*/ , SMS_FW_RCV_STAT_CD /*SMS발송수신상태코드*/ , DTA_DL_YN /*데이터삭제여부*/ ) SELECT CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') , CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD /*렌탈CB등록구분코드*/ , DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , FST_OC_DT /*최초발생일자*/ , OC_BSDT /*발생기준일자*/ , OC_CRT_DT /*발생생성일자*/ , OC_FILE_CRT_DT /*발생파일생성일자*/ , CHG_FILE_CRT_DT /*변동파일생성일자*/ , RLS_FILE_CRT_DT /*해제파일생성일자*/ , BF_RLS_DT /*이전해제일자*/ , RLS_DT /*해제일자*/ , DL_DT /*삭제일자*/ , CLCTAM_OG_TP_CD /*집금조직유형코드*/ , CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금파트너번호*/ , NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , NOTY_FW_OJ_YN /*알림발송대상여부*/ , NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_DT /*알림수신일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_YN /*알림수신여부*/ , NOTAK_RS_CD /*알림톡결과코드*/ , SMS_FW_RCV_STAT_CD /*SMS발송수신상태코드*/ , DTA_DL_YN /*데이터삭제여부*/ FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' AND NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: /* 렌탈CB납입정보(팝업) */ SELECT X.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T2.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T3.CNTR_NO||'-'||T3.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_SN /*계약상세번호*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'COPN_DV_CD', T2.COPN_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T2.COPN_DV_CD /*법인격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SELL_TP_CD', T5.SELL_TP_CD, #{session.langId}) AS SELL_TP_NM /*상품구분*/ , T7.PD_CLSF_NM /*상품명*/ , (SELECT SL_RCOG_DT FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ /*T:WELLS매출월마감내역*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(X.OC_BSDT,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')) AS SL_RCOG_DT /*매출일자*/ , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대폰번호1*/ , T2.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대폰번호2*/ , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대폰번호3*/ , T4.MPY_BSDT /*자동이체 약정일자*/ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'FNT_DV_CD', S1.FNT_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) FROM TB_RVCL_BIL_PLAN_BAS S1 /*T:청구계획기본*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND BIL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(X.OC_BSDT,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND ROWNUM = 1) AS FNT_DV_NM /*결제수단*/ , X.DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , X.DLQ_BLAM - (SELECT SUM(NVL(RVE_AMT,0)) FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL /*T:수납상세*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND RVE_PROCS_YN = 'Y' /*수납처리여부*/ AND DP_DV_CD = '1' /*입금구분코드-1:입금*/ AND DP_MES_CD IN ('01','02') /*입금수단코드-01:현금,02:신용카드*/ AND (RVE_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(X.OC_BSDT,'YYYYMM'),1),'YYYYMM')||'01' AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(X.OC_BSDT,'YYYYMM'),1),'YYYYMM')||LPAD(T4.MPY_BSDT,2,'0')) ) AS DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금담당자번호*/ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL /*T:집금파트너상세*/ WHERE PRTNR_NO = T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND OG_TP_CD = 'HR1' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PRTNR_KNM /*집금담당자명*/ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(T8.FWBOO_DTM,1,8),'YYYYMMDD')+4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /*등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일*/ , X.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*NICE발송제외여부*/ , SUBSTR(T8.FWBOO_DTM,1,8) AS FWBOO_DTM /*알림톡발송일자*/ , (SELECT (CASE WHEN RESULT = '1000' THEN 'Y' WHEN RESULT != '1000' THEN 'N' ELSE '' END) FROM ATA_MMT_LOG S1 /*T:알림톡전송이력*/ WHERE S1.MT_PR = T9.MT_PR AND MT_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(MT_SEQ) FROM ATA_MMT_LOG WHERE MT_PR = S1.MT_PR)) AS RESULT_YN /*알림톡성공여부*/ , '' AS NOTY_FW_OJ_DT /*알림톡발송제외일자*/ FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ X /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 /*T:고객기본*/ ON T2.CST_NO = X.CST_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS WHERE BND_BIZ_DV_CD IN ('L21') /*채권업무구분코드-L21:리스*/ ) T3 /*T:채권계약기본*/ ON T3.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T3.CNTR_NO = X.CNTR_NO AND T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T4 /*T:계약결제기본*/ ON T4.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T4.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T5 /*T:계약상세*/ ON T5.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 /*T:상품기본*/ ON T6.PD_CD = T5.BASE_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS T7 /*T:상품분류기본*/ ON T7.PD_CLSF_ID = T6.PD_CLSF_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ WHERE FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'E' /*채권알림톡업무코드-E:등록관련*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ ) T8 /*T:채권메시지중계내역*/ ON T8.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(T5.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) = X.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATA_MMT_TRAN WHERE TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /*템플릿코드*/ ) T9 /*T:알림톡전송*/ ON T9.RESERVED3 = T8.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND T9.RESERVED1 = T8.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND T9.RESERVED2 = T8.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ AND T9.RESERVED5 = T8.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND X.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /*렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동*/ AND NVL(X.DLQ_BLAM,0) > 0 /*연체잔액*/ AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = '01' /*연락제외대상유형코드-01:고객번호*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD IN ('02','03') /*연락제외매체유형코드-02:문자,03:알림톡*/ AND SUBSTR(T8.FWBOO_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT) /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/
